description:
Your handheld guide and planning tool for all four Walt Disney World Parks – 
Maps, Wait Times, Dining Info, Scheduling Tools, GPS Features and More!

****Named “Best App for Taking on Walt Disney World” by Fox News!****

  ➤  180-Day Advance Planner
  ➤  Disney Dining 
  ➤  Customizable Schedule
  ➤  Accurate Wait Times
  ➤  Interactive Maps
  ➤  Planning Tools
  ➤  GPS Tools
  ➤  Games 


How will UndercoverTourist’s iPhone app help me BEFORE my trip? 

180-Day Advance Planner
  ✓  Know the park hours, parade & event schedule and recommended parks for the next 180 days
  ✓  Use the helpful ‘Traffic Light System’ to determine which day of the week is best for each park
  ✓  Attraction descriptions help determine your must-do list
  ✓  Use filters to sort by age, height restrictions and FASTPASS
  ✓  See the current wait times so you’ll know which attractions typically have the longest lines 

Disney Dining 
  ✓  Save time & money with detailed Disney Dining information from theme park & resort restaurants
  ✓  See full menus with pricing to know which restaurants suit your family
  ✓  Sort the restaurants by Table Service, Quick Service, Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner
  ✓  Use the ‘Detail View’ to see Disney Dining Plan, Tables in Wonderland and more!
  ✓  Save confirmation #s for Dining Reservations in your customizable schedule

Customizable Schedule
  ✓  Schedule must-see shows and parades, attraction favorites and dining information
  ✓  Email the schedule to yourself & others in your group right from the app!


What about DURING my trip?

Accurate Wait Times
  ✓  Save time, don't walk all the way to the other side of the park just to find out the wait time
  ✓  Support the community by submitting ride wait times while you’re in the park
  ✓  Mark your favorite attractions and add them to your schedule

Interactive Maps
  ✓  No more inconvenient foldable paper park maps…now they’re in the palm of your hand!
  ✓  See accurate wait times for each attraction integrated real-time into the map
  ✓  Find the closest restrooms and smoking areas
  ✓  Zoom out to see a layout of the entire park
  ✓  Zoom in to see attraction information; “tap” the attraction for attraction details

Planning Tools
  ✓  Be right on time with park opening hours, parade & show times
  ✓  Know which park as Extra Magic Hours 
  ✓  Did you customize your schedule? Alerts will remind you what’s next on your schedule!

GPS Tools
  ✓  See which attractions & restaurants are closest to you with the ‘Near Me’ feature
  ✓  Find your car in the massive parking lots with the ‘Where Did I Park?’ feature
  ✓  Keep track of everyone in your group with the ‘Friend Finder’
  ✓  Lost? Use the ‘Locate Me’ feature

Games 
  ✓  Keep the kids occupied with the fun tile match memory game
  ✓  Customize the images using your own pictures
trackCensoredName: Disney World Wait Times, Dining and Maps Free by UndercoverTourist.com
